text: The Norwegian Labour Party () has been, since its founding in 1887, the main political party of the centre-left in Norway. It is currently the party of government in the country. It is the biggest party in Norway. The current party leader is Prime Minister Jonas Gahr St√∏re. ==References== ==Other websites== * Arbeiderpartiet - Official site * - Information in English * Election results for the Labour Party in the 2011 local elections Category:1887 establishments in Europe Category:Socialist International Category:Social democratic parties in Europe Category:Political parties in Norway Category:19th-century establishments in Norway
title: Norwegian Labour Party
